name: moonrepo
long_description: moonrepo is a developer tool that reduces build/test/deploy times, and maintenance costs for companies. Weâ€™ve achieved this through moon, our open source build system and repository management tool. moon can be paired with moonbase, our paid service that provides cloud caching, CI insights, code ownership, and health score related metrics. The company is founded by Miles Johnson and James Pozdena who have a combined 25+ years in the software development industry with tenure at Airbnb and Coinbase.
one_liner: Open source build tool for monorepos and large codebases
